questions.quote: He might as well have! I caught him, and his face was covered in chocolate and cookie crumbs.
George, what we have is too important. We can work through this.
What's the one with the swirling chocolate in the commercial?
Well, I mean, as long as you're okay, that, that's the important thing.
If anything, we'll probably get there early. I'll have a chance to go to the Duty Free shop.
And I'm moving out of my parents' house, I'm taking that apartment on 86th street, remember the one we saw?
Wow! Zanadu . No wonder you're putting in so many hours.  May I?
Where I go? You mean she was asking me to wear this ridiculous shirt on national TV, and I said 'Yes'?!
I don't understand. You get job security - you get a pay check every week..
No, bread is his soul. He's trying to buy back a loaf of his soul.
